QuestData.Title: Speaking with the Dead
QuestData.Description:
Ya be livin' up ta ya part of da bargain. I be ready ta show ya what remains of Torga's soul.
I gonna need a little part of ya ta act as a conduit ta be summonin' Torga. Don't worry, I be givin' ya all back.
Mostly.
After we be done, I be headin' out. Ya always welcome ta call on me again... but only if ya got another deal ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Bwonsamdi to summon Torga's spirit.
